about.title: About
about.content: I'm a tech-savvy web developer fluent in English and Spanish. Strong in algorithms, optimization, and data structures. Effective communication and problem-solving skills for seamless collaboration with clients and teams.

list.title: My to do's app
list.description: Enhance your productivity with our React-based web app for to-dos. 100% frontend, effortlessly add, edit, and delete tasks. Simplify your life, stay focused on your goals. Master your tasks stylishly and effectively today!

list.title: Travel forms to Disney
list.description: Fuel your agency's growth, catering to global Disney and Universal destinations. Seamlessly gather client data for magical trips. Explore the future with our app, featuring Next.js and TypeScript, combined with an array of advanced technologies.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Want to work together or have any question?
